prompt.instruction: I will give you context with the facts about people and objects they carry, hidden in some random text and a question. You need to answer the question based only on the information from the facts.
prompt.examples:
<example>
Daniel went to the bedroom. Daniel got the apple there. How many objects is Daniel carrying?
Answer: one
</example>
<example>
Mary grabbed the apple there. Mary gave the apple to John. How many objects is Mary carrying?
Answer: none
</example>
<example>
Sandra travelled to the hallway. Sandra picked up the milk there. Sandra took the apple there. Mary travelled to the garden. How many objects is Sandra carrying?
Answer: two
</example>
prompt.post_prompt: Your answer should contain only one word - $none$ or $number_of_objects$. Do not write anything else after that. Do not explain your answer.
